Now,  Valve has made some gaming classics. Such as the half life series and the Portal series. Portal 1, I had previously played portal 2 at a friends house, I loved it dearly. But it was very long ago, and, I never got far. I had forgotten practically everything, and I have not seen footage of portal 1.  Well, I can tell you, that this game is amazing.
Love this game, challenging and fun to portal hop. the end credits are dope as well, they stay very in line with the games theme. Great job, Valve!
Very good and make me shit my pants
this game  is the best have played it twice it is so good

Fun puzzle game, honestly give it a try

As someone who hasn't really played video games before, much less finished one, this was very approachable and fun. I appreciated the increasing difficult of each level. I have really bad coordination and am terrible with shooting games, and so I really appreciated the unlimited save spots, and the respawn at a recent moment. For experienced gamers, I'd say this is very easy if you know how to solve puzzles, for the newbies, I would say this is a great game to play and not feel overwhelmed.
I have been wanting to play this game for so long i am am finally. It is more than what i was expecting! THIS GAME IS AMAZING
pretty good, not as good as 2 but still solid

ClÃ¡ssico, barato e divertido. VocÃª termina ele bem rÃ¡pido mas mas caso esteja atrÃ¡s de todas as conquistas, boa sorte. Algumas sÃ£o bem difÃ­ceis e me drenaram a paciÃªncia de tal modo que larguei elas de mÃ£o. Vou esperar alguns meses, revisitar e pela nostalgia "platinar ele". Super recomendo.

-Portal is a great place to start and I recommend you play this before playing the second as it is short but sweet. This game will typically take 3-5 hours to complete depending on how quick and BIG BRAIN you are, and i think this game introduced the portal gun, Chell (the main character you play as) and super AI 'GLaDOS' well with giving enough lore to keep you interested throughout the puzzling.

-lore is decent enough in this game as it sets up events for the second game, the purpose of this game is to really introduce the ideas more than anything. With that said, if you are already familiar with how portal's main mechanics work and you do not care about the lore, you could skip this and play Portal 2, but if you have already purchased this and you're deciding whether to play the first for the gameplay, I would still advise you do so.

-Overall, this game is really just a short experience, but a good one and probably deserves its 'classic' title.

At first, I really hated this game because of the graphics. Before playing Portal, I played the 2nd release, which I like much more a lot than the original. NGL, I apologise. This game is much easier than the 2nd version of Portal and a bit better than Portal 2. Recommend to everyone, It's worth its money.

VERY BAD GAME

This game has no CHEESE!!!

Portal is a fun and innovative puzzle game. You shoot portals to teleport from one place to another and all puzzles are based on this. Funnily I managed to beat the whole game and all 6 extra advanced levels in just 1 sitting, which shows how short the game is. But I had fun playing it. Also, the soundtrack is cool.


7/10

Portal kickstarted what many consider to be the greatest franchise in gaming, and its hard not to see why. The puzzles are masterfully crafted, the overall design and aesthetic of the facility is fresh and unique, and the portal mechanic is wonderfully implemented. Honestly, the only thing this game lacks is story. Absolute must-get that is 100% worth the price.
